steps: Place a wire rack in a rimmed baking sheet and coat with nonstick cooking spray
If using tortilla chips, pulse in food processor into fine crumbs (should yield about 1 cup). Pour into a shallow dish
Place flour in a second shallow dish
Beat eggs lightly in a third shallow dish
Working with one chicken tender at a time, coat completely in flour, shaking off excess
Dip floured tender in beaten egg, letting excess drip off
Press into tortilla chip crumbs (or panko), coating all sides thoroughly
Arrange breaded tenders on the prepared wire rack without touching
Bake for 14-15 minutes until golden and fully cooked through (internal temperature 165°F)
Serve warm or at room temperature with your choice of dipping sauces
title: Crispy Baked Chicken Tenders
